00045 struct SignalRegister {
00046     enum reg {
00047         reg1 = CTK_SIGNAL_REG1, 
00048         reg2 = CTK_SIGNAL_REG2,
00049     };
00050 };
00051 
00055 class Spe {
00056         unsigned int m_tagMask;
00057 
00058     protected:
00059         /* implement me */
00060         virtual const ctk_spe_context_t& getInternalContext() const = 0;
00061 
00062     public:
00066         enum SpeStatus {
00067             UNKNOWN = ::CTK_SPE_STATUS_UNKNOWN, 
00068             CREATED = ::CTK_SPE_STATUS_CREATED, 
00069             LOADED = ::CTK_SPE_STATUS_LOADED,   
00070             READY = ::CTK_SPE_STATUS_READY,     
00071             RUNNING = ::CTK_SPE_STATUS_RUNNING, 
00072             STOPPED = ::CTK_SPE_STATUS_STOPPED, 
00073         };
00074 
00075         virtual ~Spe() { }
00076         
00078         virtual SpeStatus getStatus() const {
00079             return (SpeStatus)::ctk_spe_context_get_status(getInternalContext());
00080         }
00081 
00086         virtual ea_addr_t getLS() {
00087             ea_addr_t addr;
00088             int ret = ::ctk_spe_map_ls(getInternalContext(), &addr);
00089             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00090                 throw Error(ret);
00091             return addr;
00092         }
00093 
00098         virtual ea_addr_t getSignalReg1() {
00099             ea_addr_t addr;
00100             int ret = ::ctk_spe_map_signal1(getInternalContext(), &addr);
00101             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00102                 throw Error(ret);
00103             return addr;
00104         }
00105 
00109         virtual ea_addr_t getSignalReg2() {
00110             ea_addr_t addr;
00111             ::ctk_spe_map_signal2(getInternalContext(), &addr);
00112             return addr;
00113         }
00114 
00122         virtual int readMbox(unsigned int &data) {
00123             int ret = ::ctk_mbox_read(getInternalContext(), &data);
00124             if (ret == CTK_ERROR_NO_DATA)
00125                 return 0;
00126             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00127                 throw Error(ret);
00128             return 1;
00129         }
00130 
00137         virtual void writeMbox(unsigned int data) {
00138             int ret = ::ctk_mbox_write(getInternalContext(), data);
00139             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00140                 throw Error(ret);
00141         }
00142 
00149         virtual void readMboxBlocking(unsigned int &data) {
00150             int ret = ::ctk_mbox_read_block(getInternalContext(), &data);
00151             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS) 
00152                 throw Error(ret);
00153         }
00154

00162             int ret = ::ctk_mbox_write_block(getInternalContext(), data);
00163             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00164                 throw Error(ret);

00166 
00174         virtual int readIntrMbox(unsigned int &data) {
00175             int ret = ::ctk_intr_mbox_read(getInternalContext(), &data);
00176             if (ret == CTK_ERROR_NO_DATA)
00177                 return 0;
00178             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00179                 throw Error(ret);
00180             return 1;

00192                 throw Error(ret);
00193         }

00201             int ret = ::ctk_mbox_read_count(getInternalContext());

00298         inline int
00299         getMemory(ls_addr_t ls_addr, void *ea_addr, dma_size_t size)
00300         {
00301             int tag = ctk_dma_new_tag();
00302             int ret = ::ctk_dma_get(getInternalContext(), ls_addr, ea_addr, size, tag);
00303             if (ret == CTK_SUCCESS)
00304                 m_tagMask |= (1 << tag);
00305             return ret;
00306         }
00307

00655         /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00657         template <typename _T, int _ALIGN> inline int
00658         getMemory(ls_addr_t ls_addr, Aligned<_T, _ALIGN>& data)
00659         {
00660             int tag = ctk_dma_new_tag();
00661             int ret = ::ctk_dma_get(getInternalContext(), ls_addr, (void*)data,
00662                             data.size(), tag);
00663             if (ret == CTK_SUCCESS)
00664                 m_tagMask |= (1 << tag);
00665             return ret;
00666         }

00767         /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00771         virtual inline int
00772         waitMemoryAll()
00773         {
00774             int ret = ::ctk_dma_wait_all(getInternalContext(), m_tagMask);
00775             m_tagMask = 0;
00776             return ret;
00777         }
00778 
00782         virtual inline int
00783         waitMemoryAny()
00784         {
00785             return ::ctk_dma_wait_any(getInternalContext(), m_tagMask);
00786         }
00787 }; // Spe
00788 
00792 class SpeContext : public Spe {
00793     private:
00794         ctk_spe_context_t m_context;
00795         ls_addr_t m_pc;
00796         int m_retStatus;
00797         int m_stopCode;
00798         ctk_atomic_ea_t m_counter_ea;
00799 
00800         void release() {
00801             if (m_counter_ea != 0) {
00802                 if (_ctk_atomic_dec(m_counter_ea) == 1) {
00803                     // we were the last one
00804                     ::ctk_spe_context_destroy(m_context);
00805                 }
00806             }
00807         }
00808 
00809     protected:
00810         // implement
00811         virtual const ctk_spe_context_t& getInternalContext() const { return m_context; }
00812 
00813     public:
00818         SpeContext(unsigned int flags = 0, void *info = NULL)
00819             : m_context(NULL), m_pc(CTK_SPE_DEFAULT_ENTRY),
00820               m_retStatus(0), m_stopCode(0)
00821         {
00822             int ret = ::ctk_spe_context_create(&m_context, flags, info);
00823             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00824                 // ctk_spe_context_create should clean up any memory
00825                 // on failure, so we can just throw an Exception
00826                 throw Error(ret);
00827             m_counter_ea = CTK_ATOMIC_EA(m_context->m_counter);
00828             _ctk_atomic_inc(m_counter_ea);
00829         }
00830 
00832         SpeContext(ctk_spe_context_t &context)
00833             : m_context(context), m_pc(CTK_SPE_DEFAULT_ENTRY),
00834               m_retStatus(0), m_stopCode(0), m_counter_ea(0)
00835         {
00836         }
00837 
00839         SpeContext(const SpeContext &ctx)
00840             : m_context(ctx.m_context), m_pc(ctx.m_pc),
00841               m_retStatus(0), m_stopCode(0),
00842               m_counter_ea(ctx.m_counter_ea)
00843         {
00844             if (m_counter_ea != 0)
00845                 _ctk_atomic_inc(m_counter_ea);
00846         }
00847 
00849         SpeContext& operator=(const SpeContext& ctx)
00850         {
00851             if (m_context == ctx.m_context)
00852                 return *this;
00853 
00854             release();
00855 
00856             m_context = ctx.m_context;
00857             m_pc = ctx.m_pc;
00858             m_retStatus = m_stopCode = 0;
00859             m_counter_ea = ctx.m_counter_ea;
00860             if (m_counter_ea != 0)
00861                 _ctk_atomic_inc(m_counter_ea);
00862         }
00863 
00865         virtual ~SpeContext() {
00866             release();
00867         }
00868 
00873         virtual void load(SpeImage &image) {
00874             int ret = ::ctk_spe_context_load(m_context, image.getProgram());
00875             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00876                 throw Error(ret);
00877         }
00878 
00883         virtual void load(ctk_spe_program_t &program) {
00884             int ret = ::ctk_spe_context_load(m_context, &program);
00885             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00886                 throw Error(ret);
00887         }
00888 
00894         virtual void load(const char *fname) {
00895             SpeImage image(fname);
00896             int ret = ::ctk_spe_context_load(m_context, image.getProgram());
00897             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00898                 throw Error(ret);
00899         }
00900 
00905         virtual void run(ls_addr_t *entry, unsigned int runflags,
00906                     void *argp, void *envp, int *status, int *stop_code)
00907         {
00908             int ret = ::ctk_spe_context_run(m_context, entry, runflags, 
00909                             argp, envp, &m_retStatus, &m_stopCode);
00910             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00911                 throw Error(ret);
00912             m_pc = *entry;
00913             if (status != NULL) *status = m_retStatus;
00914             if (stop_code != NULL) *stop_code = m_stopCode;
00915         }
00916 
00921         virtual void run(void *argp = NULL, void *envp = NULL)
00922         {
00923             int ret = ::ctk_spe_context_run(m_context, &m_pc, 0, 
00924                             argp, envp, &m_retStatus, &m_stopCode);
00925             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00926                 throw Error(ret);
00927         }
00928 
00933         virtual void run(ls_addr_t &entry, void *argp = NULL, void *envp = NULL)
00934         {
00935             int ret = ::ctk_spe_context_run(m_context, &entry, 0, 
00936                             argp, envp, &m_retStatus, &m_stopCode);
00937             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00938                 throw Error(ret);
00939             m_pc = entry;
00940         }
00941 
00945         virtual void stop() {
00946             ::ctk_spe_context_stop(m_context);
00947         }
00948 
00950         virtual unsigned long long getID() const {
00951             return CTK_SPE_ID(m_context);
00952         }
00953 
00955         ls_addr_t getPC() const { return m_pc; }
00956 
00958         void setPC(ls_addr_t pc) { m_pc = pc; }
00959 
00961         int getStopCode() const { return m_stopCode; }
00962 
00964         int getExitCode() const { return CTK_SPE_EXIT_STATUS(m_retStatus); }
00965 
00967         bool isExited() const { return CTK_SPE_IF_EXITED(m_retStatus); }
00968 }; // SpeContext class
00969 
00970 }; // namespace ctk
00971 
00972 #endif /* _CTK_SPE_CONTEXT_HPP */
